projects.name: ShopVibe
projects.description: This store is built using React.JS for the frontend, Express.JS and Node.JS for thebackend. MongoDB is used for the database management system. The cartfunctionality is created by using Redux to store the cart items. Stripe payment is available in this application. Also some MaterialUI components are used for niceraesthetics.
features: Uses can create account with their passwords hashed in the backend.
Users can add products to cart and then checkout using Stripe paymentgateway.
Admin can manage the products, categories and user roles. Also the analytics ofproducts and users is also available on admin panel dashboard.

projects.description: An URL shortener built using Django that will take care of long unbearable links and provide a uniquely made shortened URL, just for you, that will redirect you to your desired link. Very simple to use. Anyone can just paste a link and get it shortened for free. Links do not expire and stay the same way as you created.

projects.name: E-commerce API
projects.description: This is an e-commerce API built using the Django Rest Framework with the use of Python. It features user authentication where users need to confirm their email using a confirmation link during signup. Orders are tied to user accounts, and users can create orders based on their preferences. An account requires a unique phone number for registration, and passwords can be reset using email.
features: An account requires a unique phone number to register.
Passwords can be reset using email.
